messages.message:
I’m seeing this issue when trying to spin up a `ibdev-backend` sandbox. Is this an issue on our end? Sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/hoangpaul11?cw=dev)
```dev        Cluster Network crafting-aihub      ✓ Active                                                                                                                                                 
dev        Cluster Network crafting-aihub      » Pending                                                                                                                                                
                                                 E rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = unexpected HTTP status code received from server: 502 (Bad Gateway); malformed header: missing HTTP content-type
rabbitmq   Cluster Network crafting-aihub      ✓ Active                                                                                                                                                 
rabbitmq   Cluster Network crafting-aihub      » Pending                                                                                                                                                
                                                 E rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = unexpected HTTP status code received from server: 502 (Bad Gateway); malformed header: missing HTTP content-type```
Also, qq: does our `ibdev-backend` template require the k8s `crafting-aihub` cluster? I was under the impression that it was self sufficient.
Oh wait, it’s chugging along now. But my question still stands on why the template needs the crafting-aihub cluster. Assume I know nothing
oh no, issue came back again

Opened a thread with the Crafting devs, I think it’s related
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03B865Q74K/p1744847680383129
